TextView.android:text: It is a crime investigation scene in which the participants will be provided with evidences of the crime scene and will have to draft a small situational analysis of the incident that took place.

Rules for Criminal Investigation
 1. Participants will have to register themselves near the venue.
 2. After the registration they will be divided into groups
 3. Once the groups have been allotted to the participants, each group will be provided with a set of evidences.
 4. Once the groups are provided with the evidences, the crime scene should be guessed.
 5. Each group will be provided with 15 min for drafting out the crime scene.
 6. Any kind of misbehavior and cheating amongst the groups is not acceptable.
 Judging Criteria:
 1. It will be based upon the best solution provided for the problem given.
 2. Merit certificates will be awarded to best solution(best team) and best speaker.
 3. Decision of the judge is final.

*Note: Any kind of changes regarding the events will be solely the decision of the organizers on the basis of the situation and cannot be questioned.
